    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void verifyProposal(AbstractStateReplacementFlow.Proposal<? extends java.lang.Class<? extends net.corda.core.contracts.UpgradedContract<? super net.corda.core.contracts.ContractState,?>>> proposal)
      Check the state change proposal to confirm that it's acceptable to this node. Rules for verification depend on the change proposed, and may further depend on the node itself (for example configuration). The proposal is returned if acceptable, otherwise a exception StateReplacementException is thrown.

      • Methods inherited from class net.corda.flows.AbstractStateReplacementFlow.Acceptor

    • Method Detail

      • verifyProposal

        public void verifyProposal(AbstractStateReplacementFlow.Proposal<? extends java.lang.Class<? extends net.corda.core.contracts.UpgradedContract<? super net.corda.core.contracts.ContractState,?>>> proposal)

        Check the state change proposal to confirm that it's acceptable to this node. Rules for verification depend on the change proposed, and may further depend on the node itself (for example configuration). The proposal is returned if acceptable, otherwise a exception StateReplacementException is thrown.

        See Also:
        exception StateReplacementException
